tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PaymentGatewaySecurityChecks (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE flagged_attempts (
    attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_id INT,
    flag_reason TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE login_attempts (
    attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ip_address VARCHAR(50),
    success BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE payment_attempts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
